org.openimaj.ml.annotation.bayes

Class NaiveBayesAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.ml.annotation.AbstractAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>
      • org.openimaj.ml.annotation.IncrementalAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>
        • org.openimaj.ml.annotation.bayes.NaiveBayesAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>
  • Type Parameters:
    OBJECT - Type of object being annotated
    ANNOTATION - Type of annotation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Classifier<ANNOTATION,OBJECT>, Annotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>, IncrementalTrainer<Annotated<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NaiveBayesSentimentAnnotator

    public class NaiveBayesAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>
extends IncrementalAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>
    Annotator based on a Naive Bayes Classifier. Uses a VectorNaiveBayesCategorizer as the actual classifier.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

        public static <OBJECT extends FeatureVector,ANNOTATION> NaiveBayesAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION> create(NaiveBayesAnnotator.Mode mode)
        Convenience method to construct a NaiveBayesAnnotator in the case where the raw objects are themselves the feature and thus an IdentityFeatureExtractor can be used. This method is equivalent to calling new NaiveBayesAnnotator(new IdentityFeatureExtractor
